member.description: Chairperson of the IEEE Student Branch of Shivajirao S. Jondhale College of Engineering, Dombivli

alumniOf.name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering Sonarpada Dombivli (East)

profile.name: Sanjyot Dahale
profile.description:
Hi I'm Sanjyot Dahale. I have two passions, to create video games and to play video games. I am a programmer by heart and I love to learn and teach programming. Game Development is my passion and I have been learning game development since I was 16 years old. I have developed a few games throughout my time using the Unity Engine and I'm currently learning the Unreal Engine. I also have a lot of interest in other fields like Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality and Internet of Things.

The phrase 'Jack of all trades, Master of None' does not apply in today's world but its updated version 'Be the Jack of all trades and a Master of one' is definitely the one which we should follow, hence being constantly updated in current technology has always been my goal.

I was the founding member of the IEEE Student Branch of our college and have been a integral part of the Student Branch since then. I was the Treasurer and a part of the Executive Committee of the IEEE SSJCOE Student Branch in the year 2018-2019 and I have been an active participant in all the activities of the Student Branch. Being a programmer, I have conducted a lot of workshops and competitions on the topics of Programming and Game Development. I have also conducted some team building and networking sessions which help the students to connect with each other, helps in team-building and also helps to induce confidence into the students.
